name: Dan (Damballa)
shortLoreBlurb: Dan (Damballa) is a deity/spirit from Fon/Ewe associated with cosmic serpent, creation. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom.
description: Dan (Damballa) is a deity/spirit from Fon/Ewe associated with cosmic serpent, creation. Serpents mark thresholds and hidden wisdom.
